metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21678 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A global buffer overflow in the genmp_writefontmacro_latex component ingenmp.c of fig2dev 3.2.7b allows attackers to cause a denial of service(DOS) via converting a xfig file into mp format.

criterions.comment: fig2dev: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
